name: Goldy Pick
skill: Deals 3006/3686 DMG to current target, with a moderate chance of inflicting Stun.
ability: Moderately (10%) increases the number of soulstones received from battle.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a pickaxe carried by treasure hunters as a good luck charm. She likes to brag that finding a golden pickaxe can turn any treasure hunter into a legend, but she just made that up. All her "legendary treasure hunters" just happened to get lucky, that's all.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 21/09/16 - 12/10/16
◦ Trade at Exchange for 70 Mochi 09/10/16 - 12/10/16
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the total Event Points gained by 25% during the "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" event.
◦ Summon rate increased until 21/09/16 - 12/10/16

main: "If it's treasure you seek, look no further. For you, I can find anything."
skill: "Nothing like being smothered in gold! Enjoy!"
summon: "Another spirit agent? Okay! I'll make you happy, I promise!"
limit_break: "Woohoo! Here's to finding even more happiness!"
